name: Jinko
description:
Jinko is the new free-to-play action shooter from the makers of MAXIMUM CAR and 8-BIT WATERSLIDE, Ancient Games.

Set in a mysterious fantasy world you play as JINKO, a fierce warrior devout to protect the ancient WISHING TREE from hoards of enemies who seek to destroy it!

Defend the Tree, defend the king, defend humanity!

Key Features:

Endless wave-based action
Simple control mechanic
Beautiful fantasy aesthetic
Collectible power-ups
